channel.title: Home on Lucas de Lima
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Lucas de Lima

item.title: Ultra-aprendizado: domine habilidades valiosas, seja mais esperto que a competição e dê um impulso na sua carreira
Log
item.description: Sunday, December 24, 2023 Renamed tha page “reading, watching, playing and listening” to “Entertainment”. Sunday, December 10, 2023 Started to use Front Matter in the site project. Added a page with things that I’m reading, watching, playing and listening. Monday, November 27, 2023 Added a site Log. Removed Google Fonts. Sunday, November 26, 2023 Added Roper Motorcycle project. Added Others project. Added a link to Old Works. Added the glightbox to the site images.

item.title: Roper Motorcycle
item.description: A poster that I created for Espaço Roper to advertise a rock concert that the bar would sponsor.

item.title: Draco Destilaria | Social Media
item.description: Some of the social media work I have done to “Draco Destilaria”.

item.title: Ashby Digital Retouching
item.description: Digital Retouching of Ashby beers for a college project.

item.title: Aipim
item.description: Editorial Design for a article in the Aipim magazine.

item.title: Guia do usuário - Portaria a distância
T-Virus
item.description: A Resident Evil T-Virus done as a practice for modeling, shading and lighting. The final render was done entirely in Blender, with post-production in Photoshop.

item.title: Visual Identity of the 1st Roper Craft Beer Contest
Alice's Adventures in Wonderland Book / eBook
item.description: Graphic and editorial design of the Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland. In this college project, I ended up creating the printed and digital version of the book.

item.title: Cyberpunk Woman
item.description: A digital retouch of a cyberpunk woman. It was created to be the poster of a college design event. It ended up being replaced by another piece that I made.

item.title: Hophead Posters
item.description: Series of posters for the tap house “Espaço Roper”.

item.title: Lipstick
item.description: A 3D exercise that I did using the amazing work of Melih Ucer as reference. I was training how to illuminate a scene without HDR and still get a good product photoshoot feel.

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you’d like to work with me, have any question or just want to chat, please feel free to send me a message, I’ll respond to it as soon as I can! lucasdelima@gmail.com

item.title: Old Works
item.description: An assortment of old works, studys and sketchs.

item.title: Hello
item.description: I am a graphic designer with over 15 years of experience in the field. I think of creative solutions for brands and marketing campaigns, digital and print media, creative retouching, packaging development, and various graphic solutions.
